DataListSpec.Name: Sustained Giving New Donors Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing sustained giving records.
DataListSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure BBDW.USR_USP_DATALIST_SUSTAINEDGIVING_NEWDONORS ( @STARTDATE datetime = null, @ENDDATE datetime = null ) as set nocount on;
select [DATE], count([CONSTITUENTDIMID]) as [CONSTITUENTS] from
(select ft.[CONSTITUENTDIMID], min(ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE]) as [DATE] from BBDW.[FACT_INSTALLMENTPAYMENT] ip inner join BBDW.[FACT_FINANCIALTRANSACTION] ft on ip.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] = ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] where (@STARTDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] > @STARTDATE) and (@ENDDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] < @ENDDATE) group by ft.[CONSTITUENTDIMID]
except
select ft.[CONSTITUENTDIMID], '7/4/1776' as [DATE] from BBDW.[FACT_INSTALLMENTPAYMENT] ip inner join BBDW.[FACT_FINANCIALTRANSACTION] ft on ip.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] = ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] where (ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] < @STARTDATE) ) as [NEWDONORS] group by [DATE]
